ARABIC: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِذ ظَّلَمْتُمْ أَنَّكُمْ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It will not benefit you today, since you did wrong, that you share equally in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But nothing will avail you on that day, for you were unjust, and you will be partners in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (He will then be told): “Today it will not benefit you the least that after your wrong-doing you and your satans now share the chastisement.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be told on the Day of Judgment, "Regret will never be of any benefit to you. You have done injustice to your souls and you will share the torment".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: (It will be said to them) “And you will not benefit from them this day, whereas you are unjust – for you are all partners in the punishment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It will profit you not this Day as you did wrong, (and) that you will be sharers in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And since you were unjust, it will not profit you this day that you are sharers in the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It shall not profit you today, since you did evil, that you are partners in the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And it profiteth you not this day, because ye did wrong, that ye will be sharers in the doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It will be said [to such a person], "You have done wrong. Having partners in punishment will be of no avail to you today."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And it Will profit you not today, because ye have done wrong, that ye are in the torment sharers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Today that will be of no avail to you. As you did wrong, so will you share in the punishment.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When ye have done wrong, it will avail you nothing, that Day, that ye shall be partners in Punishment!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It will profit you not this Day (O you who turn away from Allah's remembrance and His worship, etc.) as you did wrong, (and) that you will be sharers (you and your Qarin) in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Because of the harm you did, it would be of no benefit to you today, you are partners in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It will not benefit you on that Day, since you did wrong. You are partners in the suffering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are [all] sharing in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:39] And it, your wishes or your remorse, will not benefit you, blind ones, this day, given that you did wrong, that is to say, [given that] it has become clear to you that you were wrongdoers, through your idolatry in this world, that you, together with your companions, will be sharing in the chastisement (this constitutes the justification, on the basis of an implied lām [sc. li-annakum …], for the ‘lack of benefit’; idh substitutes for alyawma, ‘this day’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And it profiteth you not) Allah says: it profits you not (this day) such talk, (because ye did wrong) because you disbelieved in the life of the world, (that ye will be sharers in the doom) the devils and the children of Adam.
